Class XMLFileEditor

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class XMLFileEditor
extends java.lang.Object
    XML Editor class, all methods for editing or gather information from configs.xml are here.

    jose.f.santos

    • Method Detail

      • SignIn

        public java.lang.String SignIn(java.lang.String Username,
                               java.lang.String Email,
                               java.lang.String Password)
        Used to register user in the xml file.
        Parameters:
        Username - as String
        Email - as String
        Password - as String
        Returns:
        "Error", "Username Taken" or "Email Taken" if an error is found. If the user is added the returns "New Username Added"

      • ReadFile

        public java.lang.String ReadFile(java.lang.String Username,
                                 java.lang.String Email,
                                 java.lang.String Password)
        Used to read xml file. Username is Found if user exists the password given match.
        Parameters:
        Username - as String
        Email - as String
        Password - as String
        Returns:
        If error returns "Error", "Username Not Found", "Password Incorrect" or "Email Taken". If all is correct then "Email Taken".
